resources.string: BUYER
Please Enter The 4 Digit Code Sent To
Please Enter Your Email Address To Recieve a Verification Code.
Your New Password Must Be Different From Previously Used Password

The rules for publishing ads on Buyer are created to ensure the high quality of ads and the smooth operation of buyers/sellers. Using the features and services provided by the Buyer program implies acceptance of the "Publishing Ads" rules and willingness to follow them. In case of violations, ads are removed, and the corresponding user accounts are blocked.
1. Multiple publication of ads with the same meaning in one or more different sections is not allowed.
2. Each ad must be placed in the corresponding section.
2.1 Ads must be placed in the section that corresponds to the content of the ad.
3. Before placing an ad, remember that
3.1. The ad must provide as much detailed information as possible about the product you are looking for.
3.2. All criteria of the ad (such as price, area, model, etc.) must correspond to reality. The title should also correspond to the submitted content.
3.3. The title should not contain your contact information: phone number, address, email. email address, as well as the price.
3.4. The description of the announcement should also not contain any contact information, since there are special fields for the latter.
3.5. Each announcement should present only one item. If you are presenting more than one product, please place them in separate announcements.
3.6. Each user can have only one registration (account) on the site. It is prohibited to place duplicate announcements with different email addresses by one user or organization.
3.7. The announcement must be written in English.
4. Announcements are prohibited that contain:
4.1. Offers of services and goods that are considered illegal by the current regulations.
4.2. Disrespectful language, as well as offensive expressions, including racist or religious ones.
4.3. Information about online accounts, passwords and third parties, as well as as well as offers for the sale of related services.
4.4 Offers for the sale, purchase or exchange of medicines, drugs, tobacco products, vapers, liquids intended for the latter and tobacco mixtures.
4.5 Offers on occult topics: fortune-telling, Satanism, rituals, magic, psychics, etc.
4.6 National, racial, religious, sexual discrimination.

According to the terms of use, the Buyer program reserves the right to remove any announcement without explanation if it does not comply with the rules for posting announcements. The Buyer administration and moderators have the right to make changes to the text of the announcement, move it to other sections, limit the number of announcements posted by one user, and also completely prohibit posting announcements. Users who deliberately violate the rules will be blocked from posting for a long time.
